document_data.name: Allie Shorard
document_data.mainbody: '''Allie Shorard''' was one of the proprietors of the [[Northern Light]] inn found in the town of [[Caer-Konig]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She was described as being rather slender, particularly in regard to her squat sister [[Cori Shorard|Cori]].
document_data.Personality: Allie was the more pleasant and endearing of the Shorard sisters.
document_data.Activities: At the Northern Light, Allie was tasked with greeting patrons and cleaning its numerous rooms.
document_data.Relationships: Allie and Cori often argued about how to run the Northern Light. Allie believed Cori was too frivolous with their operating money.{{Template:Cite book/Legacy of the Crystal Shard/Campaign Guide|24}}
